name: Ball Rows
description:
Ball Rows is an addictive strategic puzzle game, to play move the balls to connect 5 or more balls of the same color.

Features:
- Fun Challenging Gameplay
- Beautiful Graphics
- Great Music and Sound Effects
- Lots of Levels to complete
- 3 Difficulty settings
- Close any time and resume later
- Play Fullscreen or Windowed

A great time killer for puzzle lovers!

More info at www.boviosoft.com
